mapper.select: SELECT w.name FROM writer AS w, (SELECT writer_id FROM writer_book WHERE book_id=#{bookId} ORDER BY book_id desc) AS wb WHERE wb.writer_id = w.writer_id ORDER BY name;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (publisher_id, category_small_id, name, translator, original_price, discount_percent, discount_price, sale_price, release_date, reg_date, table_of_content, description, isbn, stock_quantity, size, weight, page, image) VALUES (#{publisherId},#{categorySmallId},#{name},#{translator},#{originalPrice},#{discountPercent}, #{discountPrice},#{salePrice},#{releaseDate},#{regDate},#{tableOfContent},#{description},#{isbn}, #{stockQuantity},#{size},#{weight},#{page},#{image});
